criteria: >95% unit test coverage on security components; All login/RBAC E2E tests passing; Manual security code review of auth/authz logic approved.
success_metrics: Zero critical security defects; RBAC enforces permissions correctly for both roles.

criteria: All RabbitMQ reliability tests passing; Signed MSIX installer deploys and uninstalls cleanly on Windows 10 & 11; IPC health check is functional.
success_metrics: System foundation is stable, reliable, and deployable.

criteria: End-to-end ingestion pipeline test (TASK-028, TASK-032) is passing; Data integrity is maintained (no orphaned files or DB records); Idempotency of persistence is verified.
success_metrics: System can reliably receive and persist DICOM studies from an external source.

gate_name: Sprint 4 Quality Gate: Viewer Performance & Functionality
criteria: DirectX spike (TASK-033) is successful; Study loading NFR (<3s for 500MB) is met; UI responsiveness NFR (<500ms) is met during interaction.
bypass_criteria: Performance issues must be logged as high-priority technical debt.
success_metrics: Core clinical viewing functionality is implemented and meets user experience targets.
